original_text: For the Lord shall judge his people, and repent himself for his servants, when he seeth that their power is gone, and there is none shut up, or left.
korean_text: 참으로 여호와께서 자기 백성을 판단하시고 그 종들을 불쌍히 여기시리니 곧 그들의 무력함과 갇힌 자나 놓인 자가 없음을 보시는 때에로다

sentences.original_text: For the Lord shall judge his people
and repent himself for his servants
when he seeth that their power is gone
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 힘이 없어진 것을 보실 때에

sentences.original_text: and there is none shut up, or left
